data.prayer: Jesus, call those who are far off in Tirol, Austria, so that they and their family can receive life.
data.verse: For the promise is to you, and to your children, and to all who are far off, even as many as the Lord our God will call to himself.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Tirol, Austria

data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Tirol to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 175 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, please give the church in the state of Tirol prophets who can build up holiness and faithfulness to you.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Tirol with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Afghani, general people might believe through him.

Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Tirol, Austria. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Father, bring yourself glory in Tirol. Through your servants plant 138 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Spirit, supernaturally prepare encounters with the gospel on sites like Facebook and Instagram for the 692,200 people living in Tirol.

location.name: Tirol
location.people_groups_list: Han Chinese, Mandarin, Jew, German-speaking, Persian, Arab, Vietnamese
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Han Chinese, Mandarin (38,000), Jew, German-speaking (9,400), Persian (18,000), Arab (19,000), Vietnamese (3,600)
